verses.plain: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

tokens.t: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

verses.plain: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

tokens.t: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock

verses.plain: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.

tokens.t: For thou hast been a shelter for me,
a strong tower from the enemy.

verses.plain: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

tokens.t: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

verses.plain: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.

tokens.t: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given
the heritage of those that fear thy name.

verses.plain: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.

tokens.t: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life:

verses.plain: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.

tokens.t: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth,

verses.plain: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.

tokens.t: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.

footnotes.text: Thou…: Heb. Thou shalt add days to the days of the king
as…: Heb. as generation and generation
